summary: Frontend testing completed for Saqr App design update. All requested features are working correctly - new logo, blue color scheme, login, homepage, scrolling, profile, bottom navigation, and advertiser page.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All design updates verified. New logo (logo_saqr.png) displays correctly on login and homepage. App name 'صقر' shows in blue (#60a5fa). Dark background (#0a0a0f) with decorative blue circles working.

login_page_new_logo.details: New logo (logo_saqr.png) displayed in circular container with blue border

login_page_app_name.details: App name 'صقر' displayed in blue (#60a5fa) color

email_login_form.details: Email form with inputs (email, password) and submit button working

homepage_logo_and_name.details: Logo and 'صقر' name displayed at top of homepage

homepage_scrolling.details: Page scrolls smoothly, all content accessible

profile_page.details: Profile page shows user info (Test User), points balance, stats

bottom_navigation.details: 4 nav items working: الرئيسية (Home), أعلن الآن (Advertiser), حسابي (Profile), إعلانات (Ads)

advertiser_page.details: Shows pricing packages ($500-$4200) and ad submission form with all inputs

design_verification.decorative_circles: Blue circles with blur effect present
design_verification.overall_theme: Professional dark theme with blue accents
